title: Latvian President officially proclaims 2026 budget
summary_full: President Edgars Rinkēvičs has proclaimed next year's state budget and 46 accompanying laws, according to a statement in the official publication Latvijas Vēstnesis.
summary_public: President Edgars Rinkēvičs has proclaimed next year's state budget and 46 accompanying laws, according to a statement in the official publication Latvijas Vēstnesis.
